@CharcoCommander @laffodile @TF_Moments The Japanese naval ensign used (and currently uses) one offset to the side. The army's flag was centred. The national flag (with just the circle) is always centred.

For the swastika (Hakenkreuz) flag, the state flag was offset, the party flag was centred.

@SciFi_Wargamers I double-checked the years, but it's possible I'm wrong on the exact order for the first couple.

The list also doesn't include the supplements Dark Millennium (1994), Battles (1995) or Storm of Vengeance (1997). Or, of course, the main boxed game (1993).

@SciFi_Wargamers I believe:

Space Wolves (1994)
Eldar (1994)
Orks (1994)
Ultramarines (1995)
Imperial Guard (1995)
Tyranids (1995)
Angels of Death (1996)
Chaos (1996)
Sisters of Battle (1997)
Assassins (1997)
